title: Lynk
description:
Lynk is your 24/7 AI sales & support agent — built to grow your e-commerce revenue on autopilot.

It recovers carts, upsells intelligently, answers customer questions across channels (chat, WhatsApp, email), and tracks every interaction in real time.

Not a chatbot.

A true AI teammate that knows your products, your customers, and how to close sales.
